pages.text: Call forth peaceful creatures from the ether. This ritual spawns passive mobs in the area around the Master Ritual Stone, perfect for populating farms or simply filling the world with life.

pages.title: Costs & Details
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 5000 LP$(br)$(bold)Refresh:$() 1000 LP (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Refresh Time:$() 400 ticks (20 seconds)$(br2)$(bold)Effect:$() Spawns peaceful mobs randomly within a 4-8 block radius of the ritual stone.$(br2)$(bold)Mob Types:$() All peaceful creatures (CREATURE, AMBIENT, WATER_CREATURE, WATER_AMBIENT categories).

pages.title: Rune Pattern
pages.text: Construct the ritual with these runes:$(br2)$(bold)Layer 0 (ground level):$()$(li)Earth runes at positions$(li)Water runes for stability$(br2)$(bold)Layers 1-2:$()$(li)Mix of Earth, Water, and Air$(br2)Consult the ritual diviner or check the mod's documentation for the exact pattern.
